title: Calculate Area of an Ellipse
description:
ELLIPSE_A calculates the area of an ellipse that is defned by the radii R1
and R2.
name: ELLIPSE_A

input.name: R1
input.description: The length of the semi-major axis of the ellipse.

input.name: R2
input.description: The length of the semi-minor axis of the ellipse.

return_value.description: The calculated area of the ellipse.
